data.title: Fogelsanger-Bricker Funeral Home and Crematorium, Inc.
data.meta_description: Fogelsanger-Bricker Funeral Home and Crematorium, Inc. provides complete funeral services in Shippensburg, PA. Call us today for pre-planning or custom planning options.
data.text:
Fogelsanger-Bricker Funeral Home and Crematorium, Inc., at 112 West King Street, Shippensburg, is proud to have been serving Shippensburg and its surrounding communities since the 1930â€™s. We are known throughout the Franklin and Cumberland County area for our compassionate commitment to the families we serve.

Our success comes from our long history of caring for families that we serve and our commitment to helping families through a very difficult time. Our staff is compassionate, professional, and dedicated to meeting the needs of the families in a comforting manner.

At Fogelsanger-Bricker Funeral Home and Crematorium, we know that it is often the little things that make a big difference for families at a very difficult time. We offer a variety of services to ensure that every detail of planning a funeral or memorial service is as effortless and straightforward as possible. Our approach to funeral planning encourages families to combine our services with their own ideas to create unique, memorable funeral services for their loved ones. Our staff is dedicated to helping families arrange traditional funeral services, memorial services and cremations, and is available to make pre-arrangements and to provide after-care services when the funeral is over.
